column4: left
column5: left

column4: Test Steps
column5: Expected Results

column3: Test Azure Virtual Network connectivity and subnet configuration
column4: 1. Verify VNet created with correct address space 2. Validate subnets properly configured 3. Test connectivity between subnets
column5: Successful VNet creation with proper subnets and inter-subnet connectivity

column3: Validate session hosts can join Azure AD
column4: 1. Configure Azure AD tenant 2. Deploy session host VM 3. Attempt Azure AD join 4. Verify computer object in Azure AD
column5: Session hosts successfully joined to Azure AD with computer accounts visible

column4: 1. Create host pool with specified parameters 2. Verify load balancing configuration 3. Test session limit settings
column5: Host pool created with correct settings and accessible

column3: Validate session host VM deployment and registration
column4: 1. Deploy session host VMs from image 2. Install AVD agent 3. Register to host pool 4. Verify health status
column5: Session hosts deployed running and registered to host pool

column3: Validate custom session host image with applications
column4: 1. Deploy session hosts from custom image 2. Login to test session 3. Verify installed applications accessible
column5: Applications available and functional in sessions from custom image

column3: Validate user profile management with FSLogix
column4: 1. Configure FSLogix on session hosts 2. Login with test user 3. Create profile data 4. Logout and login again 5. Verify profile persists
column5: User profiles created accessible and persist across session disconnections

column4: 1. Launch Remote Desktop client 2. Authenticate with test user 3. Select desktop 4. Establish session
column5: Users can connect and access desktop session within 30 seconds

column4: 1. Login to AVD session 2. Launch each critical application 3. Test core functionality 4. Verify data access
column5: All critical applications launch and function correctly in AVD environment

column3: Validate printer clipboard and USB redirection
column4: 1. Connect to session 2. Test printer redirection 3. Test clipboard copy/paste 4. Test USB device access
column5: Redirected devices accessible in sessions per policy configuration

column3: Validate network access from session hosts
column4: 1. Login to session 2. Access internal network resources 3. Access external websites 4. Verify DNS resolution
column5: Network resources accessible from sessions with proper connectivity and DNS

column4: 1. Configure MFA for test users 2. Attempt login with MFA 3. Verify MFA prompt 4. Complete authentication
column5: Users authenticate successfully with MFA per security policies

column3: Validate device compliance and access controls
column4: 1. Configure Conditional Access policies 2. Test with compliant device 3. Test with non-compliant device 4. Verify access decisions
column5: Access granted only to compliant devices per Conditional Access policies

column3: Validate data encryption at rest and in transit
column4: 1. Verify storage encryption settings 2. Test RDP connection encryption 3. Validate encryption certificates 4. Review security audit
column5: All data encrypted at rest and in transit per security requirements

column3: Validate session isolation and security controls
column4: 1. Login with multiple users 2. Verify session isolation 3. Test session permissions 4. Attempt unauthorized access
column5: Sessions properly isolated and secured with no data leakage between users

column3: Validate user assignments and application access
column4: 1. Assign users to application groups 2. Login with assigned users 3. Verify desktop access 4. Test application availability
column5: Users can access assigned desktops and applications per configuration

column4: 1. Configure application groups 2. Publish RemoteApps 3. Test user access 4. Verify app visibility
column5: Application groups configured correctly with apps accessible to assigned users

column3: Validate AVD workspace for user access
column4: 1. Create workspace 2. Associate app groups 3. Subscribe users 4. Test workspace feed
column5: Workspace accessible with correct application groups and user subscriptions

column3: Validate NSG rules for session host traffic
column4: 1. Review NSG configuration 2. Test allowed traffic 3. Test blocked traffic 4. Verify logging
column5: NSG rules properly configured allowing required traffic and blocking unauthorized

column4: 1. Configure diagnostic settings 2. Generate test events 3. Verify log collection 4. Review dashboards
column5: Monitoring configured with logs collected and dashboards displaying metrics

column4: 1. Configure alert rules 2. Simulate alert conditions 3. Verify alert triggers 4. Test notification delivery
column5: Alerts trigger correctly for defined conditions with proper notifications

column4: Test Steps
column5: Expected Results

column3: Validate system performance under normal user load
column4: 1. Deploy load testing tools 2. Simulate 50-100 concurrent users 3. Monitor system performance 4. Measure response times 5. Review resource utilization
column5: System maintains performance with expected load and session response time <3 seconds average

column3: Validate system scalability limits and auto-scaling
column4: 1. Gradually increase user load 2. Monitor auto-scaling behavior 3. Test with 200+ concurrent users 4. Verify scale-out triggers 5. Test scale-in
column5: System handles peak load or scales appropriately with auto-scaling functioning correctly

column3: Validate bandwidth and latency under various conditions
column4: 1. Test from different network locations 2. Simulate various bandwidth conditions 3. Measure session latency 4. Test with remote users 5. Monitor network metrics
column5: Acceptable performance across network conditions with session quality maintained

column3: Validate user login and session establishment speed
column4: 1. Measure login time from connection to desktop 2. Test with cold and warm sessions 3. Monitor profile load time 4. Test across different user types
column5: User login completes within 30 seconds with profile load optimized

column4: 1. Measure app launch times for critical apps 2. Test with multiple concurrent launches 3. Monitor resource impact 4. Test across session types
column5: Applications launch within 5 seconds with acceptable resource utilization

column4: 1. Measure profile load/save times 2. Test with various profile sizes 3. Monitor storage IOPS 4. Test concurrent profile access
column5: Profile containers load quickly with adequate storage performance

column4: 1. Configure auto-scaling policies 2. Simulate varying load patterns 3. Monitor scale-out behavior 4. Monitor scale-in behavior 5. Verify cost optimization
column5: Auto-scaling responds appropriately to load changes within defined thresholds

column3: Validate data protection and recovery capabilities
column4: 1. Configure backup policies 2. Perform test backup 3. Simulate data loss 4. Perform restore operation 5. Verify data integrity
column5: Successful backup and recovery operations with recovery time within RTO

column4: 1. Document disaster scenarios 2. Test failover procedures 3. Verify data availability 4. Test recovery processes 5. Validate RTO/RPO
column5: Disaster recovery procedures effective with acceptable recovery times

column3: Validate efficient resource allocation and usage
column4: 1. Monitor CPU utilization across hosts 2. Monitor memory usage patterns 3. Track storage consumption 4. Analyze network bandwidth 5. Identify optimization opportunities
column5: Resources efficiently utilized with no bottlenecks or waste

column4: 1. Disconnect session abruptly 2. Test automatic reconnection 3. Verify session state preservation 4. Test network interruption handling
column5: Sessions reconnect automatically with state preserved

column4: 1. Test with multiple session hosts 2. Simulate host failure 3. Verify user redirection 4. Monitor service availability 5. Verify no user impact
column5: System maintains availability during host failures with transparent failover

column4: 1. Test Windows update process 2. Verify maintenance window compliance 3. Test application updates 4. Monitor update impact 5. Verify rollback capability
column5: Updates applied successfully during maintenance windows with minimal impact

column4: 1. Monitor Azure consumption 2. Verify auto-scaling cost savings 3. Review resource right-sizing 4. Test cost alerts 5. Analyze cost trends
column5: Costs optimized through auto-scaling and right-sizing with visibility into spending

column4: 1. Measure task completion times 2. Compare to baseline 3. Test common workflows 4. Gather user feedback 5. Identify improvements
